name: nanobar
description: Very lightweight js progress bars (for browsers)

scripts.test: npm run build && browserify test/index.js -o test/dist.js && run-headless-chromium test/test.html
scripts.build: rm -f nanobar.js && head -1 src/wrapper.js > nanobar.js && cat src/index.js >> nanobar.js && tail -n +3 src/wrapper.js >> nanobar.js && uglifyjs nanobar.js -o nanobar.min.js

author: Jacobo Tabernero jacobo@xarope.eu
